features: BIG HERO FUN FOR SMALL MARVEL FANS: Little heroes can pretend to save the day with this preschool Marvel action figure set, which includes 6 favorite Super Hero figures
6 ICONIC MARVEL CHARACTERS: Captain America's Super Jungle Squad includes Captain America, Ant-Man, Marvel's Falcon, Black Panther, Marvel's Hawkeye, and Iron Man action figures
POSEABLE ARMS AND LEGS: Kids can imagine daring missions and awesome match-ups as they move the figures into dynamic poses
KEEP THE ACTION GOING: Look for more Super Hero Adventures toys, including action figures and vehicles (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.)
SUSTAINABLE PACKAGING: Ships in simple, recyclable packaging that'​​​​​​​s easy to open and frustration free
body.description: Little heroes can pretend to save the day with some of their favorite Marvel Super Hero action figures! Captain America's Super Jungle Squad includes Captain America, Iron Man, Ant-Man, Marvel's Falcon, Black Panther, and Marvel's Hawkeye figures. Little ones can imagine daring missions and awesome match-ups. Collect them all for more adventures! Copyright MARVEL. All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners. HASBRO and PLAYSKOOL and all related trademarks and logos are trademarks of Hasbro, Inc.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kid loves it.
reviews.reviewText: They are cute and small! My kid love the Marvel universe and loves anything he can get his hands on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good deal but they stopped short just a little
reviews.reviewText: These are really cool figures that have a great feel to them and are a little thicker and more sturdy than the Imaginext characters we pair them with. These have a bit of extra personality in their exaggerated shapes compared to a lot of Imaginext figure that are worthless if the pain on their face wears off. These have a face shape, making them safer to not look scary if the paint comes off with age. These will be among a small batch of my son's toys that I aim to keep in storage if he ever outgrows them. They seem like the sort of toy that will take quite a while to outgrow, considering my son is only three. My only qualm with the Playskool Heros line compared to Imaginext is that the Heros usually come with weapons that do not fully detach unless it's a projectile weapon. This set has zero accessories. The bow and shield remain attached. I can only assume that the lack of accessories was something to keep the age range broad. My son is three and he needs some swords and stuff so he can get them lost in the classic way. These are really cool character to hold though. The feel of them in your hand is gratifying. The Imaginext variety are not sculpted with this level of detail. The packaging has a good feel too, for gifting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These look well made and easy for little fingers to play with. But I’m afraid it does not look like I paid $25 for this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend this brand and all products
reviews.reviewText: These are my toddlers favorite toys right now. They are great quality and durable even through a rough toddler. I LOVE how caps shield can't be removed. FINALLY a captain america we bought that we won't have a lost shield. They are the perfect size for our boy who's turning 3. They fit in his hands well. He plays with them more than the 5in ones or the full size ones (yes we have almost every single one in this brand) were only missing about 3 more to the set which will be buying soon because they are just that great. None have broken. None have given issues -- in any of the sizes. Playskool Heroes are an A+ 5 STAR FROM MY FAMILY.

2nd set of these little figurines I have purchased for my son, 2 different sets, they are always a huge hit super heros and little guys are always a big hit.My 4 year old plays with these for hours. I wish they made more sets, because we would love them too.They last years!
